sentences.english: Therefore, each servant girl saw her don't defiance to neglect.
sentences.chinese: 因此，各個丫鬟見了她都不敢怠慢。

sentences.english: The Simpson sisters have been very vocal lately when it comes to snubs against their family.
sentences.chinese: 辛普森姐妹都非常聲最近當談到怠慢對他們的家庭。

sentences.english: Noble Herodias we are not mindful of our guests.
sentences.chinese: 尊貴的希羅蒂，我們可不能怠慢了客人。

sentences.english: Was a Cheng to cure apt neglect too fair Sun 12 Chinese officers.
sentences.chinese: 就是懲治了怠慢了也只是損了一兩個漢官。

sentences.english: The state has been dishonored in its head.
sentences.chinese: 國務院一直怠慢了，在它的頭部。

sentences.english: If I am inattentive or careless, I will fall.
sentences.chinese: 如果我怠慢或粗心，我會墜落。

sentences.english: These are my distinguished guests, and should not suffer any slights .
sentences.chinese: 這幾位都是我的上客，一定不能怠慢。

sentences.english: This is the day to worship the god of wine;
sentences.chinese: 今天是請酒神的日子，沒有人怠慢。

sentences.english: Although Daniel become a star, but no snub to Li Jun.
sentences.chinese: 丹尼爾雖然成了明星，卻對李君沒有怠慢半分。

sentences.english: Some members of the tribe blame the crisis on neglect of the deities.
sentences.chinese: 有些部族成員把這場災難歸咎於人們對神的怠慢。

sentences.english: The rejection may be seen as a snub by many in Washington.
sentences.chinese: 印度的拒絕可能被華盛頓的某些人視爲對美國的怠慢。

sentences.english: The snubs from fellow Latin American nations were particularly painful.
sentences.chinese: 來自拉丁美洲兄弟國家的怠慢，使得墨西哥尤爲痛苦。

definition: in fear and trepidation (idiom); in reverence before your majesty (court formula of humility)
how could one dare?/I don't deserve such praise
